titleStmt.title: Howe one may take profite of his enmyes [sic], translated out of Plutarche
De capienda ex inimicis utilitate. English
titleStmt.author: Plutarch.
Elyot, Thomas, Sir, 1490?-1546, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete by Thomas Berthelet, printer to the kynges most noble grace,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: De capienda ex inimicis utilitate.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Running title, which is split and transposed recto to verso, reads: Profette of enmyes.
Probably issued with "The table of Cebes" by Cebes (STC 4890.5).
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
